Targeting the calves can be achieved through exercises like calf raises, jump rope, box jumps, and calf presses, which help strengthen the calf muscles and improve lower leg stability. Targeting the hip flexors can be done with exercises like leg lifts, mountain climbers, hanging leg raises, and hip flexor stretches, which help strengthen and stretch the hip flexor muscles. Effective dumbbell exercises include dumbbell bench press, dumbbell rows, dumbbell shoulder press, and dumbbell lunges, which engage various muscle groups and help build strength.
